title: Australia news live: Erin Patterson’s mushroom murders sentence to be handed down

title: Jade: That’s Showbiz Baby! review – former Little Mix star thrives in chaos on an idiosyncratic debut
summary: Jade Thirlwall's new music features a mix of electroclash, Eurovision flair, and emotive synth-pop. While the journey is engaging, she struggles to sustain the energy and coherence throughout an entire album. Overall, the project showcases her versatility but lacks consistency.

title: UK advertising watchdog accused of breaking rules in its own ad campaign
summary: A complaint has been filed requesting the Advertising Standards Authority (ASA) to investigate claims associated with a promotional campaign involving well-known household brands. The complaint raises concerns about the accuracy and truthfulness of the promotional claims. The outcome of the investigation could impact future advertising practices for these brands.

title: Londoners buying lowest share of property outside capital since 2013
summary: Experts warn that stagnant house prices and a resurgence of in-person office work are limiting people's options to relocate from cities. This trend may hinder mobility and alter residential patterns. The implications could affect urban development and housing markets.

title: Revealed: the huge growth of Myanmar scam centres that may hold 100,000 trafficked people
summary: Crime syndicates, supported by the military junta, have led to a doubling of large complexes like KK Park along the Thai-Myanmar border since 2021. These developments are linked to illicit activities in the region. The expansion reflects the growing influence of organized crime in the area.
